Text: Hey anyone what is PDTV-RiVER? Link? Password region? because for the first time could not play without having to load some other software. I Dont trust anything that does not play on VLC or gnome
Plays fine on MPC-HC on Win7 with no codec packs, so I have no idea what your problem is.
Dawgy, it plays just fine on gnome-mplayer, and doesn't ask for a password.
